name.description: The unique name of the policy definition. This is usually the same as what is after the / of the resource ID

displayName.description: The display name of the policy definition.

version.description: Tracks details about the version of the contents of a policy definition.

category.description: Determines under which category in the Azure portal the policy definition is displayed.

preview.description: Determines under which category in the Azure portal the policy definition is displayed.

mode.description: The policy definition mode. Possible values are NotSpecified, Indexed, and All.

parameters.description: Required if a parameter is used in policy rule.

policyType.description: The type of policy definition. Possible values are NotSpecified, BuiltIn, and Custom.

id.description: The resource ID of the policy definition. This is only used when describing existing policies.

type.description: The Azure type of the definition file, e.g. Microsoft.Authorization/policyDefinitions

systemData.description: The system metadata related to this resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource: user, application, managedIdentity, key.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource: user, application, managedIdentity, key.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC).
